docs.lead_paragraph: INSIDIOUS, under-cover revolution brews in the world of Spring food fashions. Modes that but yesterday bade fair to dominate the gastronomic scene are abandoned.

headline.main: IN FOOD, ALSO, A NEW FASHION IS HERE; Where Once We Prated About Calories and Vitamins We Are Now Concerned With an Alkaline Balance

docs.abstract: Feature article by E F Barnard
docs.snippet: INSIDIOUS, under-cover revolution brews in the world of  Spring food fashions. Modes that but yesterday bade fair to dominate the gastronomic scene are abandoned.
